amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill civil actions alleging any violation of a constitutional or civil right.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 115-29 to exempt from the bill civil actions alleging any violation of a constitutional or civil right.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 227 (Roll no. 155).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 227 (Roll no. 155).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Conyers.
